entry.name: drop
entry.desc: The drop effect hides or shows an element fading in/out and sliding in a direction.

dl.dd: Hides the element by dropping in the direction
Shows the element by undropping from the direction. This seems inverted from the hide.
Will use hide or show depending on the current visibility of the element

desc.p: The direction the element will fall to "hide" the element, or the direction from which the element will be revealed.

option.name: duration
option.desc: The number of ms the animation will run for

option.name: complete
option.desc: A callback function, executed when the effect completes
